org.whired.ghost.net
Class Connection

java.lang.Object
  org.whired.ghost.net.Connection
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientConnection, ServerConnection
public abstract class Connection
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Whired A friendly middle layer between the connection protocols and the stream wrappers. Keeps as much of the more advanced code as hidden as possible.

Field Summary
private  WrappedInputStream inputStream
          The WrappedInputStream to be utilized.

          The Thread to interrupt when listening should stop

          The Receivable to delegate events to.
protected  java.net.Socket socket
          The socket that contains the underlying streams
